text: 1.9: Lo 34.6; Dan 10.13; 10.21; 12.1; Sek 3.2; 2 Pi 2.11-12; VB 21.7Mba Fhe Bakɨme enserir vhari Maiker, ana kamthoon Moses khuma nzuav Satan phorga shogap, ana dav, anan ndav shigi fhu. Ana vhɨra buna mbatɨga thuen Satan ga suaŋgi fhu. Zakɨra fhuvara! Ana fhura khaŋ ana nzuai, “Guma Bakɨme nduara ndu vhegɨp, kama havharar thini pɨnɨ saŋv ndu suanga.”
